old_updates.data: Space Development Agency unveils plans for next 200-satellite procurement

data.content: Its World Space Week!  Did you know that satellites help monitor environmental factors like ice melt, sea levels, and forest health from space? These observations are essential in tracking global changes to protect our planet. https://t.co/PCiIBwTZfP

#WorldSpaceWeek starts today! It takes place on the same dates every year  from October 4 to 10  but why? The answer lies in space history @astro_kutryk explains. During #WSW2024, the global space community focuses on climate change. https://t.co/wG0NIvxyoE
We have liftoff! #ESAOpenDay at ESTEC is open! @AschbacherJosef, @astro_andre and Dietmar Pilz welcome you along with our astronaut guests! https://t.co/pY9smUwWXs
